Controller::Joystick Struct Reference

Data structure that holds information about a joystick. Vertical axis is a float value between -1.0 and 1.0 Horizontal axis is a float value between -1.0 and 1.0. More...

Detailed Description

Data structure that holds information about a joystick. Vertical axis is a float value between -1.0 and 1.0 Horizontal axis is a float value between -1.0 and 1.0.
